title: Pantheon VGU when??
body:
Since {{champion:82}}  is done and qiyana is now on the PBE does that mean {{champion:80}}  is next ?

And also to Riot please dont make him a braindead champion with braindead skills because playing him is kind of boring in my opinion after playing 10 games with him

replies.body: Yes he is next but don't expect him to be in the patch right after Qiyana.  He will probably be a bit after that.
He's probably the next one. I've been looking forward to Panth's vgu.

Well we have Qiyana heading to LIVE Servers next week on the 26th (at the earliest). The Schedule does say that Pantheon is next in line after Qiyana, however I do suspect that it might be a lil while before he comes to PBE.

If I had to make a prediction, Pantheon could be ready sometime either before or after Worlds 2019 (between August and September). This is just my guess anyways, he might take longer or he might be released earlier than that.
